    • Method Detail

      • writeCsv

        public static void writeCsv(java.util.List<FeatureVector> textVectors,
                            java.io.BufferedWriter writer)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Prints (to STDOUT) a comma-separated version of the term-document matrix specified in the textVectors argument.
        Parameters:
        textVectors - each member of this list is a vector-representation of one document
        writer - provides access to the stream where we'll send our output (e.g. STDOUT or a file)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - File/filesystem glitches

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
